payload.content: AI coding tools struggle with real production codebases.

name: AI coding tools struggle with real production codebases.
content: AI coding tools struggle with real production codebases.

payload.content: A Stanford study on AI's impact on developer productivity found that a lot of the 'extra code' shipped by AI tools ends up just reworking previously shipped 'slop'.

name: A Stanford study on AI's impact on developer productivity found that a lot of th
content: A Stanford study on AI's impact on developer productivity found that a lot of the 'extra code' shipped by AI tools ends up just reworking previously shipped 'slop'.

payload.content: Coding agents are effective for new projects or small changes, but they can decrease developer productivity in large, established codebases.

name: Coding agents are effective for new projects or small changes, but they can decr
content: Coding agents are effective for new projects or small changes, but they can decrease developer productivity in large, established codebases.

payload.content: It is possible to achieve significant results with current AI models in complex codebases by embracing core context engineering principles.

name: It is possible to achieve significant results with current AI models in complex
content: It is possible to achieve significant results with current AI models in complex codebases by embracing core context engineering principles.

payload.content: The speaker's team has used 'frequent intentional compaction' — deliberately structuring how context is fed to AI throughout development — to enable Claude code to handle 300k LOC Rust codebases, ship a week's worth of work in a day, and maintain expert-reviewed code quality.

name: The speaker's team has used 'frequent intentional compaction' — deliberately str
content: The speaker's team has used 'frequent intentional compaction' — deliberately structuring how context is fed to AI throughout development — to enable Claude code to handle 300k LOC Rust codebases, ship a week's worth of work in a day, and maintain expert-reviewed code quality.

payload.content: Context Engineering is a term coined in the April 2025 essay '12 factor agents' by Dex Horthy, referring to principles for effectively managing context for AI agents.

name: Context Engineering is a term coined in the April 2025 essay '12 factor agents'
content: Context Engineering is a term coined in the April 2025 essay '12 factor agents' by Dex Horthy, referring to principles for effectively managing context for AI agents.
